name: Coworker
description: Coworkers can open the door anytime

name: Shifter
description: Shifters can open the door anytime

name: Member
description: Members can open the door any day between 8am and 7pm

name: Improcollective
description: Members of the Improcollective can open the door on Tuesdays between 6 and 11pm

name: Building Manager
description: Building Manager can open the door anytime
